thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: I would have no hesitation in recommending this company. had trouble ordering on website and had to go to the livechat. the lady there was excellent and took the order over the phone. the jacket arrived next day as promised.
